Package control

Class CareerCenterStaffManager

java.lang.Object
control.CareerCenterStaffManager
public class CareerCenterStaffManager extends Object
Manager class for career center staff operations. Handles registration approval/rejection, internship approval, and application review.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructs a CareerCenterStaffManager with the specified DataManager.

      Parameters:
      repID - the unique identifier of the company representative
      staffID - the staff ID performing the approval (for activity logging)
      Returns:
      true if approval was successful, false otherwise

    • getInternshipsByFilter

      public List<Internship> getInternshipsByFilter(String status, String preferredMajor, String level)
      Filters internships by status, preferred major, and/or level. Passing null for any parameter skips filtering on that attribute.
      Parameters:
      status - the internship status to filter by (or null to skip)
      preferredMajor - the preferred major to filter by (or null to skip)
      level - the internship level to filter by (or null to skip)
      Returns:
      a list of internships matching the specified criteria
